repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: There are two texts in the manuscripts. Title of the text is same. Brahmapadaśaktivāda of Śrīnivāsācārya and Brahmapadaśaktivāda by Anantācārya. On 1v first four lines are written in Telugu. On the front cover title : śrīparamahaṃsmadhuramaṃgalasvāmikṛt śaktivādaḥ brahmapadaśaktivādaḥ Separate numeration for both texts.

msItem.title: Brahmapadaśaktivāda
msItem.author: Śrīnivāsācārya
msItem.incipit: t1-1v 5 mahidharo bṛhantīti sthūl t1-1v 6 lapamaṇamātra aiva hi bṛhidhānoḥ prayogo dṛśyate idañca sthabhavyamatra niratiśayadaśāviśiṣṭañced ? the yātu śaktessaṃkocakābhāvāt svatassiddhaṃ
msItem.explicit: t1-40r 1yaṃ vijjyaṃgatāṃ śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ śrīvaravaramunaye namaḥ srīnivāsamahāgurave namaḥ . śrī śrīnivāsasrīnandanārāyaṇagurubhyāṃ namaḥ śrīmahā t1-40r 2 gurave namaḥ . śrīrāmānujagurave namaḥ sarvebhyo bhāgavatebhyo

msItem.title: Brahmapadaśaktivāda
msItem.author: Anantācārya
msItem.incipit: t2-1v 1 muraharacaraṇabjadhyānadharāṃ vidhāya prathītayatipatiśrīpādapadmaṃ praṇamya viśadata mamanantācāryyavaryyaḥ prasīddhāṃ prakaṭayati cittāṃ brahmaśabdasyaśaktiṃ . īha tāvat brahmaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ vicāryyate . svātmaścintāśrayatva
msItem.explicit: t2- 16v 7 ṭīkāvākyaṃ ca sopattikaṃ vyākhyānaṃ lakṣaṇavāda ityalamatīvasvareṇa .
msItem.finalRubric: t2-16v 7 iti brahmapadaśaktivādaḥ śeṣāryavaṃśaranantena yādavā?tivasthitā anantararyyaṇaracito vādārtho yaṃ vijṛṃbhatā .. śrī..

support.p: thin palm leaf as cover guard.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 1 blank folio, 48 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin. Both texts have separate numeration.
supportDesc.condition: Good with some folio have broken margin.

handNote.desc: First text only incised. Second text incised ink. First hand writing is broad in style where as second is sharp and small characters.

additions.desc: 1 blank folio title in the left margin brahmaśaktivādaḥ
1v in the left margin is written śrī.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
